title: Teachware-Based Self-Directed Competency Development Course: Simulation Learning in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Establishes a self-directed learning environment utilizing VR simulations and teachware in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can independently explore and utilize Teachware content to solve practical problems in science domains.
Learners can virtually design and execute science experiments via VR simulations and analyze results.
Learners can compose self-reflection reports and incorporate peer feedback through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
